titles.title: Expressing the sense of the Congress that the current Federal income tax deduction for interest paid on debt secured by a first or second home and for property taxes should not be further restricted.
Expressing the sense of the Congress that the current Federal income tax deduction for interest paid on debt secured by a first or second home and for property taxes should not be further restricted.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Expresses the sense of Congress that the federal income tax deductions for interest paid on debt secured by a first or second home and for property taxes should not be further restricted.
